price: Have you not seen how your Lord dealt with the people of the Elephant[1]?
arabic: أَلَمۡ تَرَ كَيۡفَ فَعَلَ رَبُّكَ بِأَصۡحَٰبِ ٱلۡفِيلِ
footnotes: [1] The army of Abrahah al-Ashram was accompanied by a huge elephant who came with the intention of demolishing the Kaʿba.

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
